ygData.subject: RE: RE: Twinking thoughts
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrmm...twinking... Guilty. Not with my monk, as I set him up with a specific RP philosphy.  No twinkage there. Got a little bored with Lei.  Started an Erudite
ygData.messageBody:
Hrmm...twinking...

Guilty.

Not with my monk, as I set him up with a specific RP philosphy. No twinkage
there.

Got a little bored with Lei. Started an Erudite Enchanter. Being low level
again sucked. Especially as an Enchanter. So I figured on some nice
healthy twinkage should squeeze me through these crap times onto when
Enchanters get to be fun.

Moderately heavy twinkage. Haha! I am a bad ass now! Problem solved?
Nope. After a while, I just figured no matter how cool they seem,
enchanters just aren't for me.

Back to Lei. Having much fun, but I feel the dark side calling.

A DE Necro is born. My god is this character fun! Even at level one! Life
tap has to be the coolest spell ever made! /pet kill Muhahahaha! Evil is
good! I'm having a ton of fun with this character and have no particular
desire to twink her. She's doing just fine on her own.

So, my thoughts on twinking?

*shrug* I can see both sides.

In the end, no matter what I say or do, some people are going to twink and
others aren't. Ultimately, it's up to Verant to decide if they want
twinking or not.

Lei
